indications.name: Insufficient disk space
indications.description: Build node or EBS volume is out of disk space, rerun build with CLEAN_WORKSPACE parameter
indications.comment: Build node or EBS volume is out of disk space, clean build node or the EBS volume
log_testcases: error: unable to open output file '...': 'No space left on device'

indications.name: Build node disconnected
indications.description: Build node disconnected during the build
indications.comment: Build node disconnected during the build, rerun the job
log_testcases: Agent went offline during the build

indications.name: Incremental build script error
indications.description: Incremental build script error, merge latest from upstream
indications.comment: Incremental build script error, merge latest from upstream

indications.name: Corrupt PDB file
indications.description: Corrupt PDB file, try build again with build parameter CLEAN_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY enabled
indications.comment: Corrupt PDB file, try build again with build parameter CLEAN_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY enabled
log_testcases: LINK : fatal error LNK1285: corrupt PDB file 'D:\workspace\o3de\build\windows_vs2019\bin\profile\o3de.pdb'

indications.name: Case sensitive/insensitive issue
indications.description: Once case changed in file name, run a clean build to fix the build failure.
indications.comment: Once case changed in file name, run a clean build to fix the build failure

indications.name: Jenkins build node connectivity issue
indications.description: Jenkins cannot reconnect to build nodes after Jenkins server restart.
indications.comment: Jenkins cannot reconnect to build nodes after Jenkins server restart.
log_patterns: ^Killed part of.*after waiting for.*because we assume unknown agent.*is never going to appear$
log_testcases: Killed part of O3DE Â» PR-9504 #2 after waiting for 5 min 0 sec because we assume unknown agent EC2 (us-west-2) - WIN2019_INC_3 (i-05a91a7e645fc20d1) is never going to appear
